scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const srcJS='node_modules/cropperjs/dist/cropper.min.js'; const destJS='js/cropper.min.js'; const srcCSS='node_modules/cropperjs/dist/cropper.min.css'; const destCSS='css/cropper.min.css'; if(fs.existsSync(srcJS)){fs.copyFileSync(srcJS, destJS); console.log('Copied cropper.min.js');} if(fs.existsSync(srcCSS)){fs.copyFileSync(srcCSS, destCSS); console.log('Copied cropper.min.css');}"
